review_text: Menopause has caused me to have interrupted sleep for over a year now.  Stress makes the sleep disturbances worse than menopause.  I decided to try this product.  I finally can sleep through the night.  I take one, an hour before bed.  Then, right before bed I take one more.  On a day that I have caffeine, it doesn't work as well.  When I wake up and cannot go back to sleep in middle of night, I take 2 and can go back to sleep and I awaken with no grogginess.  I don't know how I would manage without this product.

These tablets are generally having a positive impact on the quality & quantity of my sleep. Dosage: I take the first tablet (small-sized black capsule), then set a timer for an hour & read in bed until the hour is up. Then I take the 2nd tablet & go to sleep. I am getting a deeper sleep most nights & will continue to take the tablets.

Deep Sleep is a product I use occasionally for nights when I have to be assured of a good night's sleep before a busy day. I like that it contains California Poppy which is not an opiate, and does help sleep. I have to take it a few days for it to really work. Good to take short term, with no grogginess next morning. It doesn't help me sleep longer & I hoped it did. So I have a shorter and very deep sleep and feel well rested afterward.

Before going to bed, I take one capsule of a sleep aid about 30 minutes before bedtime. Then, I relax my muscles and try to clear my mind, as I often struggle with random thoughts. The next thing I know, my alarm is going off and I feel well-rested and ready to start my day. This is a huge relief for me, as I've had trouble sleeping for as long as I can remember. Other sleep aids usually make me feel jittery and restless, and sometimes even keep me up all night. However, the specific sleep aid I've been using doesn't have that effect on me. It simply helps me have a peaceful and restful night's sleep. The specific sleep aid I've been using doesn't have that effect on me. It simply helps me have a peaceful and restful night's sleep.

Natural ingredients mean little to no side effects. Wake up with a clear mind and all refreshed to fight the day. 
The quality is good as it does not affect stomach. The price is right for the size it comes in. The product is highly recommended. You feel sleepy naturally and no headache.

I’m going through a phase of waking multiple times a night and often get to sleep right away only to wake a couple of hours later and maybe twice after that. This isn’t a miracle for me but with continued use and following the instructions to take one and hour before and another at bed, I believe that it is slowly regulating my sleep cycle. I have taken these herbs in similar products for many years but not this one. It definitely does help/work!

This is the first time I've tried the Deep Sleep with the additional herbs, but this stuff works!!  I've tried many other things (Melatonin, CBD gummies, etc), but this brings me refreshing sleep with no after-affects.  It's not addictive and the quality herbs and ingredients make me feel good about using it occasionally.  Definitely make sure you follow the instructions, I like to take the first one, then read and then take the second about an hour later.  Within minutes I feel like I could go to sleep and then I'm out like a light.

My husband has had difficulty sleeping for years.  We have tried a number of things, but Deep Speep seems to be the best yet.  He takes it every night as directed (one an hour before bedtime and one at bedtime).  Occasionally I have had trouble sleeping, and have taken just one and it helps me too.  I usually don't have trouble, so I have never tried taking more than just one.

Fantastic supplement for sleeping. I used to have problems with the sleep as I woke up few times at night and couldn’t fell asleep, but since I discovered this supplement, I sleep so much better. Quite often I can sleep 7 - 8 hours without waking up. Sleep changing stuff.

review_title: Helps with sleep, but wears off after a while
review_text: I like Deep Sleep, but the effect of a great sleep wears off after a bit of taking it. The quality is great and the benefits of deep sleep are terrific.  Just have to stop taking for a while to get the effects back. Ingredients are all there for great sleep. As they are softgels can't really taste it.

noticeable stuff, quality is ok. Would have been nice if they used a little bit less ingredients. size of the capsules is ok. Dosage of 2 capsules is ok, but not cheap this way. Benefit is there, but from all the herbs in there I expected a little bit stronger effect, but still reall noticeable.

I've been strugling with sleep for some months now, specially disrupted sleep, I've tried lot of things (melatonin, magnesium, theanine, GABA, tryptophan, herbs blends, etc, etc...) and nothing really seems to work. I heard doctor Zach Bush recommending this product, so I will give it a try. I've used just one night and it seemed to help. I'll update the review when I've been using it for more time.

review_title: It works but with a caveat
review_text:
the effectiveness of this product decreases the more you use it, when you first use it it basically kicks in like half an hour but after you try it to take it as a regular medication it basically only makes you mildly tired 

so in other words you shouldn't take this on the regular otherwise it wouldn't be as effective (you develop tolerance) but if you use it once in a while it works and it does what it does, i think the main effective component that makes you sleep is Valarian root which has great sleep-inducing capabilities (including healing capabilities if mixed with calendula and taraxcum) 

overall i'd recommend this product for those who just need a few nights of easy sleep.

I love the Deep Sleep Products. My only complaint is that this one doesn't work as quickly for me or feel as potent as the tincture form. I wish iHerb carried the tincture in alcohol. Non-alcohol form may technically be better for sleep, but the taste difference prevents me from using alcohol free tinctures with regularity.

It works. Helps me fall asleep whenI take it exactly as directed on the label. I need to take other things along this supplement to help me with my terrible  clinical insomnia. But this formula is one of the most important and effective components of my regiment.

I have been taking Deep Sleep for a month, and I'm sleeping better and longer.  When in menopause it's not easy to sleep a whole night.  I take one capsule 30 minutes before bed and 2 capsules before I turn out the light.

This item helps me get through the night. I've suffered with insomnia way too often, but this, combined with a 5mg Melatonin, keeps me asleep. I get there pretty easily and I generally get at least six hours. I'm going to be reordering this particular item.

On each tiny black capsule - a white branded inscription. Inside - a cloudy thick liquid, similar to coffee with a small amount of milk. Aroma herbal, very pleasant. The taste is also pleasant, soft, without bitterness, sharpness or salinity. I confess I did not read the instruction carefully, where it is written that the effect starts from the second to the third day, and tried to use these capsules once. If you take the capsule once a week or once every ten days, or even a month, then you will fall asleep immediately and without any problems, but in the middle of the night you will wake up several times. One-time reception absolutely exactly leads to night awakenings. Tried many times. I tried to take even two capsules ("to be sure"), and not one by one, as the manufacturer recommends. I fall asleep clearly 15-20 minutes after the reception, but at night you suddenly wake up, stare at the clock and then fall asleep again. And so it can happen 2-3 times a night. If you take these capsules REGULARLY ONE ONE DAY, then really, on the fourth day with them you start to fall asleep quickly, sleep peacefully all night, and in the morning without problems it is possible to wake up completely rested, fresh and vigorous. At the same time, smooth slow dreams are dreamed without fuss and sharp scenes. At first I thought that the main drawback of this sleeping pill was its inhuman value. But if you find that it is enough for a three-month course, it turns out that for this money we arrange a whole season of rest in a dream - a whole spring of quality sleep! And in recalculation for each day the price does not reach and 20 rubles for a dream. It begins to seem that this pleasure is immeasurably cheap. The benefits we receive are much greater than it costs. For this money we buy ourselves a full reset, a good state of health and a great mood.
